      boolean addSSIDToBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ssids)
      Add a list of SSID to blacklist, invocation will fail and return false under these sceanarios: 1 @ssids being null, empty or length beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 2 The updated size of overall blacklist is beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 3 Any entry in @ssids is null, empty or its size beyond SSID_LENGTH_LIMIT

      Get security level for wifi
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSSIDBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      Get entire SSID blacklist

      get enterprise wifi profiles list
      boolean isUnsecureSoftApDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      get open hotspot policy state
      boolean isUserProfilesDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      get wifi restrict-network policy state
      boolean isWifiAutoConnectionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
      get wifi auto connect policy state
      boolean isWifiProfileSet(android.content.ComponentName admin, android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
      check wifi profile in MDM enterprise profile list
      boolean removeSSIDFromBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ssids)
      Remove a list of SSID from blacklist If @ssids is null, ENTIRE blacklist will be WIPED OUT, be cautious about it If @ssids is empty, or its length beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT, invocation will fail
      boolean removeWifiProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin, android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
      remove enterprise wifi profiles
      boolean setSecurityLevel(android.content.ComponentName admin, int level)
      Called by an application that is administering the device set the security level of wifi hotspot.
      boolean setUnsecureSoftApDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin, boolean disable)
      allow or deny start non-secure Wi-Fi hotspot
      boolean setUserProfilesDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin, boolean disable)
      allow or deny add/update networks on the device, include connect to a non-compliant network when disabled it just allow to connect/add/update the enterprise network which is set by MDM apks
      boolean setWifiAutoConnectionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin, boolean disable)
      allow or deny auto connect to network
      boolean setWifiProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin, android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
      add enterprise wifi profiles

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceWifiPolicyManager

        public DeviceWifiPolicyManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setSecurityLevel

        public boolean setSecurityLevel(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                int level)
        Called by an application that is administering the device set the security level of wifi hotspot. after set this, the security level of hotspot lower than this can not be connected the security level of hotspot is determined by method of authancation
        参数:
        who - represents the actived MDM apk
        Level - is from SECURITY_LEVEL_1 to SECURITY_LEVEL_6 SECURITY_LEVEL_1 : OPEN SECURITY_LEVEL_2 : WEP SECURITY_LEVEL_3 : WPA SECURITY_LEVEL_4 : LEAP/PWD SECURITY_LEVEL_5 : FAST/PEAP SECURITY_LEVEL_6 : TLS/TTLS/SIM/AKA
        返回:
        boolean. if it has been set successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getSecurityLevel

        public int getSecurityLevel(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get security level for wifi
        参数:
        who - represents the actived MDM apk

      • addSSIDToBlackList

        public boolean addSSIDToBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ssids)
        Add a list of SSID to blacklist, invocation will fail and return false under these sceanarios: 1 @ssids being null, empty or length beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 2 The updated size of overall blacklist is beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 3 Any entry in @ssids is null, empty or its size beyond SSID_LENGTH_LIMIT
        参数:
        who - represents the actived MDM apk
        ssids - ssids to be added
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeSSIDFromBlackList

        public boolean removeSSIDFromBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ssids)
        Remove a list of SSID from blacklist If @ssids is null, ENTIRE blacklist will be WIPED OUT, be cautious about it If @ssids is empty, or its length beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT, invocation will fail
        参数:
        who - represents the actived MDM apk
        ssids - ssids to be removed
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getSSIDBlackList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSSIDBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get entire SSID blacklist
        参数:
        who - represents the actived MDM apk
        返回:
        SSID blacklist as requested

      • setUserProfilesDisabled

        public boolean setUserProfilesDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       boolean disable)
        allow or deny add/update networks on the device, include connect to a non-compliant network when disabled it just allow to connect/add/update the enterprise network which is set by MDM apks
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        disable - true if device cannot connect/add/update any networks except enterprise network saved by MDMs
        返回:
        true if set policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isUserProfilesDisabled

        public boolean isUserProfilesDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get wifi restrict-network policy state
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        返回:
        true if device cannot connect/add/update any networks except enterprise network saved by MDMs
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setWifiProfile

        public boolean setWifiProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                              android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
        add enterprise wifi profiles
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        config - enterprise config to be added
        返回:
        true if set enterprise config successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getWifiProfileList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getWifiProfileList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get enterprise wifi profiles list
        参数:
        admin - represents the actived MDM apk
        返回:
        enterprise wifi profiles list as requested

      • isWifiProfileSet

        public boolean isWifiProfileSet(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
        check wifi profile in MDM enterprise profile list
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        config - config to be checked
        返回:
        true if config had been set in MDM enterprise profile list
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeWifiProfile

        public boolean removeWifiProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                 android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration config)
        remove enterprise wifi profiles
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        ssids - list to be removed, null to remove whole list for admin
        返回:
        true if remove config successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setWifiAutoConnectionDisabled

        public boolean setWifiAutoConnectionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                             boolean disable)
        allow or deny auto connect to network
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        disable - true if device cannot auto connect to configured network
        返回:
        true if set policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isWifiAutoConnectionDisabled

        public boolean isWifiAutoConnectionDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get wifi auto connect policy state
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        返回:
        true if device cannot auto connect to configured network
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

                                         boolean disable)
        allow or deny start non-secure Wi-Fi hotspot
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        disable - true if device cannot share non-secure hotspot
        返回:
        true if set policy successfully
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isUnsecureSoftApDisabled

        public boolean isUnsecureSoftApDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get open hotspot policy state
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with
        返回:
        true if device cannot share non-secure hotspot
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
